entities.name: omen
entities.description: An omen is mentioned as the cause of death in the conversation.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is still alive and has not seen an omen.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who has seen an omen in a cup and is confident about it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is skeptical about Divination and thinks it's woolly.

entities.name: grim
entities.description: The Grim is an omen that Ron saw in a cup.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a person who said Hermione didn't have the right aura.

entities.name: divination
entities.description: Divination is a subject that Hermione thinks is woolly and full of guesswork.

entities.name: arithmancy book
entities.description: Hermione's new Arithmancy book is mentioned in the conversation.

relationships.description: Ron saw the Grim in a cup.
Hermione disagreed with Professor Trelawney's statement about her aura.
